testcase.classname: Functional Scenarios for ASK Login and Logout
testcase.name: Validation of labels in Create Request page in ASK application

failure.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for condition (presence of element located by: By.xpath: //input[@placeholder='Username']) to be refreshed (tried for 30 second(s) with 1000 milliseconds interval)
